it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net

Class DataPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthPacket, Ip4Packet, Ip6Packet, PppEncapsulation, SlipPacket, TcpPacket, TunPacket, UdpPacket

    public abstract class DataPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements Packet
    Generic packet with data payload.
